sect1.title: Metadata Appearance
sect1.para: This option allows users to change colours and shapes on the network. The following screenshot shows the colours and shaped of the concept classes of the network. Clicking on the listed colours and shapes allows users to change them (see tutorial for more details).
The screenshot below shows the colours for the controlled vocabularies. In this case there are two data sources: PHI-base database (PHI) and Botrytis genome sequence (unknown).
Should you wish to see these colours applied on the network, click on View -> Colour Concepts by Controlled Vocabulary. You get:
Finally, the last tab gives colours for the relations of the network (in this case, paralogs and orthologs).
